samples.context: To prevent the incidence of infectious diseases in school following precautions can be taken: (i) Avoid contact of students suffering from air borne diseases like common cold, cough, eye, flu, etc.
samples.question: What diseases should students avoid contacting?

samples.context: (ii) By checking the availability of clean drinking water in school.
samples.question: Why is clean drinking water important in schools?

samples.context: (iii) Clean surroundings in school will not allow the growth and multiplication of vectors.
samples.question: How do clean surroundings impact disease prevention?

samples.context: (iv) Starting childhood immunisation programme in schools.
samples.question: What role do immunization programs play in schools?
